pageContext.course_type_long_description: Enter the world of Ninjago and become an apprentice Ninjaneer!  Learn the way of Spinjitzu, build the Fire Temple, race Skull Trucks, and encounter the mighty Dragon!  Imagine and build unique and fun projects with the guidance of an experienced Play-Well instructor while exploring the fantasy world of Ninjago. This is an ideal way to prepare young Ninjaneers for the challenge of Ninjaneering Masters with LEGO® Materials.
